holistic_ikigai_analysis.methodology: 3-phase comprehensive analysis using full context windows
holistic_ikigai_analysis.primary_ikigai: Maintaining digital safety and seamless access to core tools—especially within the Microsoft ecosystem—as a daily practice that brings calm, control, and readiness.
secondary_areas: Streamlined, reliable productivity routines in familiar Microsoft tools
Practical risk-reduction habits and light systems maintenance

supporting_evidence.pattern: Digital security vigilance triggers timely action and attention.
examples: New sign-in detected for your Microsoft account

supporting_evidence.pattern: Comfort and reliance on the Microsoft ecosystem for everyday operations.
examples: Security alert originating from Microsoft account services

supporting_evidence.pattern: Utility-first, transactional communication—engages when information is actionable.
examples: Security notification framed as an immediate task to verify activity

supporting_evidence.pattern: Values of safety, continuity, and data protection guide routine decisions.
examples: Monitoring sign-ins to protect account integrity and uninterrupted access

framework_dimensions.external_connection: Connects to the world through mainstream, stable platforms; prioritizes trustworthy identity and uninterrupted access to services over novelty.
framework_dimensions.active_engagement: Primarily passive and reactive (alert-driven) with moderate autonomy; engages decisively when risks or security checks arise.
framework_dimensions.emotional_meaning: Calm, relief, and confidence when accounts are protected and tools work without disruption; satisfaction from keeping things safe and orderly.
framework_dimensions.voluntary_pursuit: Signals come from imposed system alerts, yet the ongoing choice to use and maintain Microsoft accounts shows a voluntary maintenance mindset.
framework_dimensions.everyday_joy: Small wins like approving a 2FA prompt, seeing 'no suspicious activity' status, smooth logins, and predictable tool behavior that keeps the day frictionless.
framework_dimensions.growth_orientation: Latent potential to move from reactive vigilance to proactive hygiene and light optimization (e.g., structured reviews, feature mastery); limited direct evidence so far.

indicators: Receipt of a Microsoft security alert

confidence_factors: No longitudinal or cross-category data to validate consistency
Single automated security email limits pattern inference

recommendations: Establish a 10-minute weekly security check ritual: review recent activity, sign-in log, recovery info, and devices on the Microsoft account dashboard.
Consolidate authentication: use Microsoft Authenticator with number matching and store backup codes securely (offline or in a password manager).
Adopt a reputable password manager and rotate high-value credentials on a 6–12 month cadence; enable breach alerts.
Enable and standardize security notifications across key services (email, SMS, authenticator) and remove redundant or noisy channels.
Use Microsoft’s built-in features: OneDrive Personal Vault for sensitive files, security defaults, device sign-out, and review of app permissions.
Create a simple personal security playbook: what to do if you see an unfamiliar sign-in, lose a device, or need to lock down accounts.
Translate vigilance into productive ease: pin most-used Microsoft tools, set predictable start-of-day routines, and automate low-level tasks where possible.
Review quarterly: retire unused apps/devices, simplify your tech stack, and note one new security or productivity feature to learn for steady, low-effort growth.

methodology_details.phase_1: Holistic overview analysis across all emails to extract themes and patterns
methodology_details.phase_2: Contextual per-email scoring using holistic insights
methodology_details.phase_3: Synthesis and validation for comprehensive ikigai profile
methodology_details.context_window_optimization: Adaptive batching based on model capabilities
methodology_details.inclusive_approach: Analyzes ALL email types including commercial for complete picture
